title: trame: an Open Source Framework for Efficiently Building Interactive Visualization and Analysis Applications
content: Ever increasing complexity of experimental and simulated data is always placing new demands on software in data processing and visual analytics. Representing data intuitively and interactively is often crucial for deeper insight by facilitating the discovery of trends and patterns that may otherwise go unnoticed. Software design can be a daunting and expensive task, however, and typically lags behind data production, slowing scientific discovery. trame was designed to alleviate many of these challenges.
